tool_description: Reviews job posting content for legal compliance, bias detection, and regulatory requirements across different jurisdictions.

job_posting_content.description: Complete job posting text to check for compliance

target_jurisdictions.description: List of countries/states where posting will be published

check_bias.description: Whether to check for discriminatory language

check_salary_disclosure.description: Whether to check salary transparency requirements

company_type.description: Company type: private, public, government, nonprofit

error_messages: Empty posting content: Provide valid job posting content for compliance checking.
Invalid jurisdiction: One or more jurisdictions are not recognized in our compliance database.
Invalid company type: Must be one of [private, public, government, nonprofit].
Jurisdictions limit exceeded: Maximum 10 jurisdictions can be checked simultaneously.
Employee count invalid: Employee count must be a positive integer if provided.
usage: Input complete job posting content and specify target jurisdictions. Enable specific compliance checks as needed. The tool will identify violations and provide remediation suggestions.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, minor_issues, major_violations

bias_issues.description: Potential bias or discriminatory language detected

missing_requirements.description: Required elements missing from the posting
